attributes.background:
BDS attacks the fundamental basis of the legitimacy of the Jewish state and takes a detour via anti-Zionism to spread antisemitism.
Everyone has the right to express an opinion but when this translates into attacks on innocent Jewish students in university campuses in the UK this has to stop.

rejection.details: We're not sure what you mean by "declare the BDS movement illegal". If you would like a specific change to the law, you could start a new petition asking clearly for that change.
